divs: sighting detailsmy buddy and i were returning home after a fishing trip. it was about 1am, and we were traveling south along california i-5, somewhere around corning. i noticed a very bright light coming from behind us, and turned around to see what i thought was a very large plane trying to land on the freeway about a mile and a half behind us. the object dipped it's right wing tip as it came down below 50ft or so, just as if it were a large jet. the object had no lights pointing foward but was very brighly lit from behind. there were two red sphieres following, but not attached to the wing tips. my friend and i both watched for more than 15min. while the object slowly made up the distance between us. we both thought we were going to be in the way of a emergancy landing. the object caught up to us about the time we went under a overpass. the object had to pull up to make it over the overpass and was about 50ft of the ground when it went over us. about this time we both realized that this was no plane, my buddy asked if i see the spaceship. we were moving at about 65mph, and the object maybe 70-75mph. it was a dark triangle wider than a four-lane freeway, and approximately 40ft thick. there were four round very bright lights accross the back, and a row of dimely lit windows accross the top-half of the back behind them. the two red sphieres took positions about 100yrds off each side, and followed along with the triangle. the object passed directley overhead, and moved on approximately 1\2ml. than took a stationary position about 100ft. above the ground off the shoulder on our side of the road. the red sphieres held stationary positions about 1\4ml. off each corner of the triangle. we stopped and got out right underneath the object. it set thier motionless and silent with all lights out for about 5min.. it than without moving foward turned on it's center axis and moved at walking speed north along the edge of the freeway. i wanted to stay longer but my friend was really scared. i felt as if we had been the sights for someones tour bus. i also got the impression that who ever was at the controls, were confused about where they were at, or going.
Summary: Large triangle approx 100yrds wide, seen over interstate 5 for more than 20min. At less than 100 ft. away.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Corning
This sighting has never been favorited.
